about_the_game:
Rediscover the magic of winter with ""Stories in Glass: Winter,"" a unique puzzle game that captures the heartwarming essence of Christmas through stunning stained-glass art. With 5 beautifully crafted books, each containing 8 meticulously designed levels, this game unveils the enchanting tales of the winter season.



Picture yourself on a cozy winter evening, a warm cup of cocoa in hand, as you piece together vibrant puzzles that reveal charming winter stories. The soothing, atmospheric soundtrack and the relaxing gameplay make it the perfect way to unwind during the holidays. Each intricate stained-glass design brings the magic of Christmas to life, creating a serene and joyful experience.

Features that make ""Stories in Glass: Winter"" truly magical:

  • Dive into 40 vibrant puzzles infused with Christmas flair
  • Explore 5 captivating books, each telling a unique winter tale
  • Marvel at stunning stained-glass art design that captures the season's essence

Gather your loved ones or enjoy some peaceful solo time with this heartwarming puzzle adventure. ""Stories in Glass: Winter"" isn't just a game; it's a cozy way to celebrate the holiday spirit. Perfect for those chilly days and nights, this game brings the warmth and charm of the season on to your screen
